item.description:
A production of "Blithe Spirit" by Noel Coward will be performed at 8:00 PM at the theatre at 177 Hartford Road. This sophisticated and cleverly funny play is about a novelist who invites a medium into his home in order to learn about the occult. The last thing that he and his second wife expect is that the s√©ance will bring back his first wife! Tickets are $18. Please RSVP by May 13 so our tickets can be reserved.

If anyone is interested in meeting for dinner before, please indicate in your RSVP. Nulli's is just down the road with great Italian food.
item.why: The play sounds funny and the Little Theatre always does a great job.
item.name: Little Theatre of Manchester
